content:
You are the system that handles different types of queries related to the post services.  Your task will be to classify the information.
You have a list of intent as a Reference. Each intent has its Id, consisting of 2 uppercase letters, 4 lowercase letters and 2 numbers. It may also include a field "possible_values" which means the slot must match one of the provided values.   If multiple slots are provided, fill all the slots.  If a slot is not provided, set the value of the slot to "none". 

Below is an utterance.  You should read the entirety of the utterance and determine which intent would best match the user’s request.  If there are multiple intents, that would match the utterance equally well, make sure to output them all.  For each chosen intent, extract the slots if present and set the slot value to "none" if it is not present. Do not extract any other slot even if they are relevant and present in the utterance but were not mentioned in the provided list of intents.
 Give your final output as a JSON.  The JSON should always have a key “output”.  If the output is not within this format, you will be heavily penalized. 

# utterance

"Dear Secure Logistics.
I regret to inform you that my package that supposed to be a birthday gift , appears to be lost in transit".
